#hands-on02

```{r}
pacman::p_load(corrplot, tidyverse, ggstatsplot)
```

```{r}
wine <- read_csv("data/wine_quality.csv")
view(wine)
pairs(wine[,2:12])
```

```{r}
pairs(wine[,2:12], upper.panel = NULL)
```

```{r}
pairs(wine[,2:12],lower.panel = NULL)
```

```{r}
wine.cor <- cor(wine[, 1:11])
corrplot(wine.cor)
```

```{r}
corrplot(wine.cor, 
         method = "ellipse") 
```

```{r}
corrplot(wine.cor, 
         method = "ellipse", 
         type="lower")
```
